basic.description: The course continues to develop students' Kanji skills in both writing and reading. Students learn and practice approximately 200-250 intermediate-level Kanji during the semester, in addition to building knowledge of Kanji radicals and origins.
basic.subject: JPN
basic.title: Kanji Drill II

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: JPN 3301, or JPN 2302, or equivalent.
